activities: Information received is name, address (billing and shipping addresses), phone number, fax number, email address, VAT ID/Tax No, preferred billing currency. We sell scientific reagents so we require these details to allow us to ship and bill our customers for their orders. For customers paying for items with credit cards, we receive their credit card details but they are processed through authorize.net and cannot be viewed by Fitzgerald employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer - both automated and manual processed data
recoursemech: We have never had any complaints. But we would encourage our customers to raise any complaints with us before proceeding any further. Fitzgerald Industries International hereby makes a commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU and Switzerland or their authorized representatives to investigate any unresolved complaints.
